title: Product Quality Manager (PQM) – Color– Accessories, Home and Beats
summary: At Apple, a Product Quality Manager – Color has responsibility for Accessories quality and works across multiple products, suppliers, management levels, and functions to define product color appearance specifications and manufacturing quality control methods.
description: We enable the mass production of incredible products and work in tandem with Apple's renowned designers to develop measurement technologies, quality control strategies, information systems, and manufacturing methods that achieve ambitious specifications at massive production scale.
key_qualifications: Subject Matter Expert for all things related to visual color and texture comparison and assessment. 5+ years of experience in developing quality plans or experience with color appearance, gloss, texture and GD&T metrology preferred. Knowledge of quality concepts, supplier management, and manufacturing operations including; Quality Plans, FMEA, auditing, corrective and preventative actions, sampling methodologies, and process capability. Proven understanding of problem-solving tools including root cause analysis and statistical process control principles. Understanding of project management concepts. Direct PM experience a plus. Knowledge and ability to execute limit sample analysis in manufacturing settings. Experience with optical coatings, plating, anodizing, resin compounding, pigmentation, textiles, dyeing or color formulation. Detail oriented with excellent written and verbal communication skills.
education_experience: BS or higher in Engineering or Color Science required. Project management experience is a positive. Apple is an equal opportunity employer that is committed to inclusion and diversity.
